root.name: Formula One 2002
root.description: The Teams and Drivers Ferrari Michael Schumacher Rubens Barrichello McLaren David Coulthard Kimi Räikkönen Williams Ralf Schumacher Juan Pablo Montoya Sauber Nick Heidfeld Felipe Massa Jordan Giancarlo Fisichella Takuma Sato BAR Jacques Villeneuve Olivier Panis Renault Jarno Trulli Jenson Button Jaguar Eddie Irvine Pedro de la Rosa Arrows Heinz-Harald Frentzen Enrique Bernoldi Minardi Alex Yoong Mark Webber Toyota Mika Salo Allan McNish The Circuits Australian Grand Prix - Melbourne Malaysian Grand Prix - Sepang Brazilian Grand Prix - Interlagos San Marino Grand Prix - Imola Spanish Grand Prix - Catalunya Austrian Grand Prix - A1-Ring Monaco Grand Prix - Monaco Canadian Grand Prix - Circuit Gilles Villeneuve European Grand Prix - Nürburgring British Grand Prix - Silverstone French Grand Prix - Magny-Cours German Grand Prix - Hockenheimring Hungarian Grand Prix - Hungaroring Belgian Grand Prix - Spa-Francorchamps Italian Grand Prix - Monza United States Grand Prix - Indianapolis Japanese Grand Prix - Suzuka
